attributes.action: Stop 30 Marsh Wall: no more monster tower blocks on the Isle of Dogs
attributes.additional_details:
52 floors & 200m tall
60m taller than the neighbouring Landmark East Tower.

Issues:
•	Marsh Wall & Westferry Road’s infrastructure cannot cope with more tower blocks.
•	The site is tiny and will lead to years of disruption.
•	No consultation with those affected.

The monster 75-storey, 1,000+ flats ‘City Pride’ was passed by Tower Hamlets Planning Committee on a technicality. Make a stand against another 55-storey block less than 100m away because many more are already being being built or planned: 40 Marsh Wall, Heron Quays West, Arrowhead Quay, Cuba Street, Britannia Hotel(?).

Tell Tower Hamlets  Councillors and Planning Department enough is enough.
